title: Italian Launch Startup Sidereus Space Raises €5.1M in Seed+ Funding
summary:
Italian launch startup Sidereus Space Dynamics has closed a €5.1 Million Seed+ investment round. The company aims to utilize the funding to conduct its pre-flight and flight test development phases. Sidereus Space is developing EOS, a single-stage-to-orbit rocket that the company touts as “the personal computer of launch vehicles.” The 3.5-metre tall vehicle is designed […]
The post Italian Launch Startup Sidereus Space Raises €5.1M in Seed+ Funding appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: NASA Names New Head of Technology, Policy, Strategy
summary: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson announced Monday Charity Weeden will serve as associate administrator for the agency’s Office of Technology, Policy, and Strategy (OTPS), effective immediately. Weeden succeeds Bhavya Lal, who left the agency in July, and Ellen Gertsen, who had been serving as the office’s acting leader since then.

title: Historic Wind Tunnel Facility Testing NASA's Mars Ascent Vehicle Rocket
summary: The same facility that provided valuable testing for NASA missions to low-Earth orbit and the Moon is now helping the agency prepare to launch the first rocket from Mars.

title: Beijing to foster commercial space and satellite constellations as key future industries
summary: Beijing’s government intends to support commercial aerospace and satellite constellations and applications in a plan to promote industries of the future.

title: Bonanza of Asteroid Riches Lands in Utah
